definition: to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
circular argument/logical error consisting of begging the question/Latin: petitio principii

sentences.english: The equipartition law of energy is also briefly demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 同時，對能均分原理也作了簡潔的論證。

sentences.english: The profession and the public do not appreciate that advertising claims come without proof in the case of diets.
sentences.chinese: 醫生同業和大衆沒有察知廣告所宣稱的飲食並無論證。

sentences.english: The question complex of Dostoevsky's creation is for the testing of the precondition of humanity which takes freedom, guiltiness , belief as its basic ideas.
sentences.chinese: 陀思妥耶夫斯基創作的問題意識是對人性前提的論證。

sentences.english: Here there is obviously a circular problem.
sentences.chinese: 這裏明顯存在一個循環論證的問題。

sentences.english: And this point has tons of empirical validity.
sentences.chinese: 這個效應有大量的實驗論證過。

sentences.english: Vico is the first theoretician who demonstrated the primitive thinking in the idealistic history.
sentences.chinese: 維柯是思想史上第一個論證原始思維的理論家。

sentences.english: Of the modes of persuasion furnished by the spoken word there are three kinds.
sentences.chinese: 使用語言的說服性論證共有三種類型。

sentences.english: This is a devastating and, I think, brilliant argument.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是壓倒性的，極其精彩的論證。

sentences.english: The usefulness of the autonmobile in forest had been clear demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 這種汽車在森林中的作用已經被清楚論證過了。

sentences.english: And the argument could still then and proceed, as was before.
sentences.chinese: 這個論證仍舊可以說得通，像原來一樣有效。

sentences.english: The relationship between law and moral law constitutes a proof for the law must pass through.
sentences.chinese: 法與道德的關係構成了論證法之爲法的必經之地。

sentences.english: In this paper, the phase conjugate nature of the nonlinear coupling forward wave has been demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 本文論證了非線性耦合前向波的位相複共軛特性。

sentences.english: In addition this chapter also demonstrated that the obligations of non-conflict situations to choose the correct behavior.
sentences.chinese: 另外本章還論證了義務衝突情境下的非正確選擇行爲。

sentences.english: He began to gather facts to develop his theory.
sentences.chinese: 他開始收集論據以論證他的理論。

sentences.english: The argument from simplicity is quite fascinating.
sentences.chinese: 源於簡單的論證很讓人着迷。

sentences.english: Objective To approach the protection of camera anterior bulbi to thyroid homograft .
sentences.chinese: 目的論證眼前房對同種甲狀腺移植物有保護作用。

definition: conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
logic (loanword)
treatise/discourse/exposition
argument/line of reasoning/thesis/point (of discussion)
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
point of view/viewpoint/standpoint/CL:個|个[ge4]
to explain/to expound/to interpret/elucidation
to discuss/to talk over/CL:個|个[ge4]
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to infer/inference/corollary/reasoned conclusion
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
evidence/proof/to confirm/corroboration
science/scientific knowledge/scientific/rational/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
evidence/proof/testimony
